subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin broke open a tie game with two goals, leading the Washington Capitals to a 4-3 victory over the visiting Penguins and a 2-0 series lead in the Eastern Conference semifinals.
snippet: Alex Ovechkin broke open a tie game with two goals, leading the Washington Capitals to a 4-3 victory over the visiting Penguins and a 2-0 series lead in the Eastern Conference semifinals.
